column2: "Iyinom nye amanaman a EWURADZE gyae dɛ ɔdze hɔn rosɔ Israelfo a woennhu Keenan akodzi no nyinara ahwɛ no;"
"dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma Israelmba ebusuasantsen no ehu
column3: na wɔakyerɛ hɔn akodzi
column4: mekyerɛ dodow a nkyɛ nkan no wonnyim ho hwee no a."

column2: "Hɔn nye Filistiafo ahemfo beenum no
column3: Keenanfo nyinara
column5: na Hivifo a wɔtse bepɔw Lebanon do
column6: ofi bepɔw Baal-hermon ho araa dze kodu Hamat ahɛnee."

column2: "Na wɔwɔ hɔ dɛ wɔdze hɔn rosɔ Israel ahwɛ
column3: ehu kyerɛ dɛ wobetsie EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm a ɔnam Moses ne nsa do dze hyɛɛ hɔn egyanom no anaa."

column2: "Na Israelmba no tsenaa Keenanfo
column3: Hitifo

column2: "na wɔfefaa hɔn mbabaa warwaar hɔn
column3: na wɔdze hɔnankasa hɔn mbabaa so memaa hɔn mbabanyin awar

column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: na hɔn werɛ fiir EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE n'ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Israel do
column3: na ɔtɔɔn hɔn dze hyɛɛ Mesopotemiahen Kusan-risataim nsa: na Israelmba no soom Kusan-risataim mfe awɔtwe."

column2: "Na aber a Israel mba no sui frɛɛ EWURADZE no
column3: EWURADZE maa ɔgyefo bi do maa Israelmba no
column6: Kaleb no nua kuma Kenaz ne babanyin no a."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no sunsum baa no do
column3: na odzii Israel enyim; na otuu sa
column4: na EWURADZE dze Mesopotemiahen Kusan-risataim hyɛɛ ne nsa: na ne nsa daa Kusan-risataim do."

column2: "Na asaase no do dwee araa mfe eduanan. Na Otiniel
column3: Kenaz ne babanyin no wui."

column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dza omuo bio wɔ EWURADZE enyi do: dɛm ntsi EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moabhen Eglon dzen dze tsiaa Israel."
"Na ɔboaboaa Ammon na Amalekmba ano wɔ ne nkyɛn; na wɔkɔree kedzii Israel do konyim
column3: na wɔkɛgyee nkyiresua kurow no."

column2: "Na Israelmba no soom Moabhen Eglon mfe duawɔtwe."
"Na aber a Israelmba no sui frɛɛ EWURADZE no
column3: EWURADZE maa ɔgyefo bi do maa hɔn
column6: nyimpa ɔbankumnyi no a. Na Israelmba no dze akyɛdze nam no do kɛmaa Moabhen Eglon."

column2: "Na Ehud yɛɛ afona anofanu a ne tsentsen yɛ anamɔn kor nye fa; na ɔdze bɔɔ n'atar ase wɔ no ndwonku enyimfa do."
"Na ɔdze akyɛdze no maa Moabhen Eglon; nna Eglon yi yɛ nyimpa bran ankasa."
"Na aber a owiee dɛ ɔdze akyɛdze no ma no no
column3: ogyaa nkorɔfo a wɔsoasoaa akyɛdze no kwan ma wɔkɔree."

column2: "Na ɔno noara dze ɔdanee fi abopuei a ɔwɔ Gilgal nkyɛn no ho sanee kɛsee dɛ
column3: Ɔhen
column4: mowɔ esumasɛm bi ka kyerɛ wo. Na Eglon see dɛ
column5: Wɔnyɛ komm. Na hɔn a wogyina ne nkyɛn nyinara fii hɔ puei."

column2: "Na Ehud baa ne nkyɛn; nna ɔno noara nkotsee na ɔtse n'abansor dan a ɔtsena mu gye mframa no mu. Na Ehud see dɛ
column3: Mowɔ amandzɛɛ bi fi Nyame hɔ mobɔ wo. Na ɔsoɛree fii n'egua do."

column2: "Na Ehud tseen ne nsa bankum
column3: na ɔdze yii afona no wɔ no ndwonku enyimfa no do
column4: na ɔdze wɔɔ ne yafun mu:"

column2: "na afonadua no so dzii dadze no ekyir kɔr mu; na seradze kataa dadze no do
column3: na ɔanntwe afona no wɔ ne yafun mu; na opuei fiir ekyir."

column2: "Nna Ehud puei kɔr abrandaa no do
column3: na ɔtotoow abansor dan mbobow no mu wɔ n'ekyir

column2: "Na opuei kɔree no
column3: ɔhen no nkowaa no bae; na wobohun dɛ
column4: abansor dan no no mbobow no wɔatotow mu ndaagow; na wɔsee dɛ
column5: Bɛyɛ na ɔregya n'anan wɔ dan a ɔtsena mu gye mframa no ne pia no mu."

column2: "Na wɔtweɔnee araa dze kodur dɛ hɔn enyi bui: naaso
column3: oemmbue abansor dan no no mbobow no; dɛm ntsi wɔfaa saafee no

column2: "Na Ehud guanee mber a wɔrotweɔn no
column3: na otwaa mu wɔ abohonyi no ho

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a odurii no
column4: ɔhɛɛn totorobɛnto wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu
column5: na Israelmba no nye no fi nkokodo nkurow no mu sianee

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mbedzi m'ekyir: na EWURADZE dze hom atamfo Moabfo ahyɛ hom nsa. Na wosianee kedzii n'ekyir
column4: na wɔkɛgyee Jordan etwaree a wɔdze kɔ Moab no
column5: na wɔamma nyimpa biara kwan ma oenntwa."

column2: "Na aber no mu wokum Moab mu mbarimba bɛyɛ mpemdu
column3: mbarimba akɛse na mbarimba ahoɔdzenfo nyina; na ɔbarimba biara emmfi nsa."

column2: "Nna wɔbrɛɛ Moab adze da no ara wɔ Israelmba nsa. Na asaase no do dwee araa mfe eduowɔtwe."
"Na Ehud n'ekyir no Samgar
column3: Anat ne babanyin no a ɔdze nantwi ka poma kum Filistiafo mu nyimpa ahaesia no so bae: na ɔno so gyee Israel nkwa."
